entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:25 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:25 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023
